question: It is often considered that change is more beneficial to people than trying to avoid it and have everything remain the same. Do you think the advantages of change outweigh the disadvantages?
text: Interchange is a key to country's progress.In this contemporary era,there is an irrefutable debate amoung folk concerning the issues and assets of innovation.There are copious inhabitants who think that old things and rules should not be touched.Just as a coin has two sides,there are merits as well as dimerits of interchange.However,as I believe,in this essay,I will prove to you why pros outweigh the cons in the next forthcoming paragraphs.

To begin with,the first notion,there are bountiful judicious.The most proponderant is that undeniable nothing is permanent in this world except swap.In addition to,nature is the best model of swap,the day needs interchange  to switch in to nigh,all in all, climate changes ;in essence,to cherished people.In other words,the invention of ground_breaking gadgets have been a paramount factor to live a better life with less efforts rather then past.For example,according to a recent survey, stated that the China has become a richest country in the world,because they prefer new gadgets such as reborts and other working machine ,which work more faster or better then human beings . As a result,these subjects cannot be denied.

On the other hand,another pivotal factor in the aforementioned proposition is that it is only likely to help in one thrive and excel in various modes.Besides,the innoventions like internet have been a bone of contention ,especially for elders who need physical meetings and care.Furthermore,if myriads relay on machines to persue modern trend,they wouldn't be got enough exercise to stay healthy which lends an air of tremendous diseases like depression.For instance,according to a global survey, villagers have less death rate then metropolitan or modern areas ,as they don't use innovations, prefer walk for travel and held physical meetups instead of video calls.Regardless,these factors cannot be wrong to promote this view.

In the nutshell,according to the afforenamed quarells,despite having some againsts like loss of our traditions and customes ,depression of not having strong bonds;whereas,the comfort and ease due to swap surpass the against.
